articles.title: Photographer's Incredible 'GigaMoon' Image is Made From 280000 Photos - PetaPixel
articles.description: Andrew McCarthy had to wait a long time for the right weather conditions
articles.content:
Astrophotographer Andrew McCarthy has captured a “GigaMoon” — a 1.3-gigapixel highly-detailed image of the Moon made from 280,000 photos. 
It’s an image that McCarthy has wanted to capture for a lon… [+3799 chars]
